features.featureTitle: Update the scratch-off section to display an updated revealed couple illustration that matches the user-provided couple description (Punjabi, lighter/light-brown skin tones, mid-20s; sitting on a sofa; selfie pose; she has long black hair with no bangs, brown eyes, red off-shoulder full sleeve top, smiling with teeth; he has a shorter/small beard, dark blue sweater, red Sikh turban/dastaar, smiling without showing teeth; he is holding her in his arms). Ensure the ScratchFrameScene uses the updated local static asset path for the revealed image.

Change the letter text styling in the opening mailbox/letter section to use a handwritten-style font (not the current playful sans font) while preserving the exact letter content string (including line breaks and emojis) from frontend/src/components/valentine/LetterContent.ts.
